name: Agent Parry Bear
description:
You’re Agent Parry. A bear who’s after the evil Dr. Nekorius, who’ll be throwing flying hockey pockeys and minion rats your way.

Agent Parry will never resort to aggression unless attacked first, so use your umbrella to parry incoming attacks and bounce projectiles off.

WASD - Move
Left Click - Parry

Spacebar - Jump
